import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getBill } from "../store/actions"; import persianJs from "persianjs"; import moment from "jalali-moment"; import GasBillLogo from "../img/naft_iran-01.svg"; import GasMan from "../img/gasman.png"; class GasTemplate extends Component { state = {}; timeConverter = (time) => { const engDate = moment(time * 1000).format("YYYY/MM/DD"); console.log(engDate); const perSianDate = persianJs( moment(`${engDate}`, "YYYY/MM/DD").locale("fa").format("YYYY/MM/DD") ).englishNumber()._str; return perSianDate; }; persionConvertor = (data) => { const persian = persianJs(`${data}`).englishNumber()._str; return persian; }; translateNumber = (num) => { const translatedNum = persianJs(num).digitsToWords().toString(); return translatedNum; }; render() { const { billData } = this.props; return (
{billData.owner}
{billData.address}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.zipCode)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.companyArea)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.climate)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.consumerID)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.factoryID)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.billingSeries)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.fileNumber)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.consumerType)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.bundle)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.consumerCount)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.capacity)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.previousConsumption)} {this.persionConvertor(billData.currentConsumption)} {this.timeConverter(billData.previousReading)} {this.timeConverter(billData.currentReading)}
{}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.companyArea)} {} {this.persionConvertor(billData.companyArea)}
{billData.companyAddress}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.cost)}
/ {this.persionConvertor(billData.debt)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.otherLiabilities)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.tax)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.insurance)}
/ {this.persionConvertor(billData.debtBalance)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.remainingRials)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.deductionRials)}
{}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.zipCode)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.paymentID)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.billingID)}
{this.timeConverter(billData.paymentDeadline)}
{this.persionConvertor(billData.payableAmount )}
{this.translateNumber(billData.payableAmount)}
); } } const mapStateToProps = ({ GetBillReducer }) => { return { billData: GetBillReducer.data, }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getBill, })(GasTemplate);
